title: Inquiry Scrutinizes Trump Alliesâ€™ False Claims About Election Worker
description: Prosecutors are seeking testimony from three people who took part in the pressure campaign against the worker, Ruby Freeman, after the 2020 election.
category: House Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack
media:credit: Shuran Huang for The New York Times
media:description: Wandrea Moss was comforted by her mother, Ruby Freeman, as she testified in June before the House committee investigating the Jan. 6 attack on the Capitol.
